and 56k dialup

rails application i'm working on, or website files... doesn't seem to matter

then it might not be gedit
choice of editor shouldn't matter, no

or just specify it in the script

ok, added it to .bashrc
what about update-alternatives
nah, that changes it for everyone :)
but thanks, i didn't know that worked also :)
yes that's a global setting
update-alternatives shows  "editor" pointing to vim anyway :/
oh, well, that's not it then
um no :)

well, 128 is recommended
